controllers.plugins

Class Plugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.plugins.Plugin
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WelcomePlugin

    public abstract class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    khaclinh

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.slf4j.Logger log
      Makes logging service available for descending classes.
      protected PluginWrapper wrapper
      Wrapper of the plugin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plugin(PluginWrapper wrapper)
      Constructor to be used by plugin manager for plugin instantiation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PluginWrapper getWrapper()
      Retrieves the wrapper of this plug-in.
      void start()
      Start method is called by the application when the plugin is loaded.
      void stop()
      Stop method is called by the application when the plugin is unloaded.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • log

        protected final org.slf4j.Logger log
        Makes logging service available for descending classes.

      • wrapper

        protected PluginWrapper wrapper
        Wrapper of the plugin.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plugin

        public Plugin(PluginWrapper wrapper)
        Constructor to be used by plugin manager for plugin instantiation. Your plugins have to provide constructor with this exact signature to be successfully loaded by manager.

    • Method Detail

      • getWrapper

        public final PluginWrapper getWrapper()
        Retrieves the wrapper of this plug-in.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws PluginException
        Start method is called by the application when the plugin is loaded.
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws PluginException
        Stop method is called by the application when the plugin is unloaded.
        Throws:
        PluginException
